text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh, heya! ♪ I feel like I see you pretty<n>often these days.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
They're having a scrimmage on the<n>course down there right
now! I was<n>just watching 'cause I can't run in<n>any races.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Maaan, I wish I could race toooo. But<n>y'know...
choice_data_list: You really don't want to train, right?
You really don't want to train, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ... I don't.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: They told me I had to train, so I went<n>the first time!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But they only did stuff that was super<n>easy to pick up.
Everything took me<n>only one try to get, and doing stuff I<n>
already got is booooring, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And what's the point if it's boring?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun is incredibly quick<n>to learn and apply her
training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But it appears that everything she's<n>accomplished thus far
has been<n>through talent rather than effort.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She never had the need to work hard,<n>so to her, training
must be nothing<n>more than another tedious task to<n>check
off her list.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's not like I think I'm too good to<n>train or anything... I see
Yukipe and<n>everybody else training, so I get that<n>it's
important.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I mean, even City and Tamamo train<n>every single day! They
all do! I get it...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But no matter what I do, it's so<n>boring! It always feels so
pointless...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Am I weird for thinking like this?<n>Does this mean I'll never
become a<n>twinkly racer?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Whoa! N-no need to shout, y'know...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I didn't think you were the type to<n>raise your voice, since
you look so<n>nice and everything...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hrmmm...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hey, do you think I should train too?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hm... Okay.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'll do it, but only if you listen to what I<n>say.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Weeell... ♪ I was thinking...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: How about you and I go on a date?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The following day, in front of the<n>station...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And we have touchdooown! Sorry for<n>the wait! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thanks for coming with me<n>today. I wanted to go on
a date and<n>see what being a grown-up feels like!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
All right then! So where should we go<n>first?! We have to go
shopping at one<n>of those fancy stores. Oh, and we<n>can't
forget about making a stop for<n>sweets!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And then we can watch a romanticmovie! And then we can visit anexpensive cafe—one of thosegrown-up ones! Ahhh, I can'twait!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, we gotta get going! We're<n>wasting time just
standing around<n>here. C'mon, let's hurry up and take<n>off!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She jets off with a blast, dragging me<n>behind her. At the
rate we're going,<n>I'm sure we could cover the entire<n>city
by the end of the day.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Look at that T-shirt over there! Isn't it<n>so cute? And isn't
that a juice<n>stand?! I wonder if they have carrot<n>juice!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hm? Sniff, sniff... Somethingsmells really good... I think it's comingfrom that way. Let's go check it out!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey! No zoning out while you're with<n>me! We still have so
many things to<n>do! ♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So what should we watch? Hmmm,<n>they all look fun! Wait,
whaaa?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Th-th-that movie trailer showed a kiss<n>scene! And I saw it!
Oh my gosh, I'm<n>blushing...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
How many scoops of ice cream can I<n>get? One? Two?
Three? Obviously<n>three, right?! Of course it's three!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
What flavors should I pick?<n>Strawberry looks good, so I'll
have<n>that... and vanilla too. Oooh, and some<n>chocolate chip
cookie too...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wait, the cheesecake one is<n>limited-time only?! ...Hey, can I
get four<n>scoops?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For the rest of the day, Mayano Top<n>Gun dragged me
around from place to<n>place in order to make the most of her<n>
date.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Gosh, that was fun!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I gotta say though. I'm surprised you<n>could keep up with
me! You're<n>probably the first person other than<n>Marvey
who can keep up with me at<n>my max!
choice_data_list:
I thought I was going to pass out towards the
end there...

I thought I was going to pass out towards the
end there...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Really?! Does that mean you<n>stayed awake just for
me? Glad to<n>hear it!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, how come you're so nice<n>anyway? Like, why'd you
even agree<n>to go out on a date with me?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Is it 'cause I promised to train if you<n>listened to what I say?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: What do you mean "not exactly"? Youmean you didn't come with me'cause you wanted me to train?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: If that's not why, then how come<n>you're here?
choice_data_list: I don't want you to give up on your dreams.
I don't want you to give up on your dreams.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Dreams?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: My... dreams?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As if deep in thought, Mayano Top<n>Gun quiets down for
what seems to<n>be the first time—ever. Then...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So that's why...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Anyway, thanks again for today!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Let's do our training tomorrow, okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, at long last, I've convinced<n>her to train under me!
